topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55810c1a63687270cd00297a#post_55810c1a63687270cd00297a
Was there like some meltdown?

-molestia

"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55810c7863687270bc002da1#post_55810c7863687270bc002da1
Hell

To be more accurate some fuckwit thought it would be cool to advertise a furry con to a fetish magazine saying that the conventions were sex conventions and you can probably guess what happened.

You know how some people during conventions tear up hotels and are douchebags?  Imagine the chaos from someone advertising a major convention to a major fetish magazine telling them it was a *ANYTHING* goes sex convention and not to worry about anything broken.

Imagine the sort of chaos say hypothetically frat boys cause on campuses; now imagine 1000 sorts of these people horny as fuck being told that a building is a anything goes fuck convention and told not to worry about damages.  The shear amount of physical damage they caused they had to end it early and they had to change locations next year.

Imagine the amount of damage the caused.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
